_header: Do well while thou art here
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler TM 362; cf. 1137; translating ‘Fac bene dum…’.

OxfBal354.Transcription:
Do well whill þou art here& þou shalt haue well els
                    wher
